name: zide
description: 长文 AI 生产系统

scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit -w @zide/domain && npm run test:unit -w @zide/application && npm run test:unit -w @zide/infrastructure
scripts.test:integration: npm run build -w @zide/domain && npm run build -w @zide/application && npm run build -w @zide/infrastructure && node scripts/test-integration-core-flow.js
scripts.test:frontend-flow: npm run build -w @zide/domain && npm run build -w @zide/application && npm run build -w @zide/infrastructure && node scripts/test-frontend-full-flow.js
scripts.test:ui-regression: npm run build -w @zide/domain && npm run build -w @zide/application && npm run build -w @zide/infrastructure && npm run build -w @zide/desktop && node scripts/test-ui-regression-electron.js
scripts.test:preflight: npm run build && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:frontend-flow
scripts.test:preflight:full: npm run test:preflight && npm run test:ui-regression
